org.jgentleframework.context.beans
Interface Disposable

All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiExporterImpl
public interface Disposable

Interface to be implemented by beans that need to be destroyed when owning container is detroyed. A destroy() method is disposable method that is designated to be auto invoked by JGentle container when this container is destroyed.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
Initializing, DisposableMethod, InitializingMethod

Method Summary
 void destroy()
          Invoked by the owning container container before it is destroyed.

             throws java.lang.Exception
Invoked by the owning container container before it is destroyed.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
